overview:
Jerome Paradis is a Web applications developer/architect living and working out of Montreal, Canada.

Jerome Paradis is currently CTO of Shwowp Inc. a new startup we co-founded with Tara Hunt and Cassandra Girard in January 2010 currently. Shwowp is currently in semi-stealth startup mode.

Jerome Paradis is also the founder and president of Paradivision Inc. that he registered in 1989 and incorporated in 1995. At Paradivision he developed multi-channel direct marketing CRM systems including e-commerce systems. More recently he focused on Facebook application developement and developed sites using WordPress as a CMS. Jerome consulted with Montreal startups and agencies to help them with Facebook applications development.

Paradivision also does business under the Media Sidekick name since 2010 and Jerome acts as technical adviser to Media Sidekick, which is headed by his wife and blogger, Kim Vallee.
